author: FARA
description: Automatically notify admins of new MissionChief alliance member applications with Discord embeds and Accept/Deny buttons. Includes auto-accept functionality.
install_msg: Thanks for installing NewMemberNotify! Use `!newmember status` to get started and `!newmember setchannel` to configure notification channel.
name: NewMemberNotify
short: Notify admins of new alliance applications
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
